name: Survive The Meteors (Ralis)
description:
Meteors are racing down to Earth and you have to survive as long as possible! Good luck...

Hey everyone! This is the first game that I've ever made so I apologise if it's bad or buggy. I'll try to fix the glitches and bugs at a later date.

(By the way, the menu is a bit bugged in full screen mode but the actual game is fine. I'll try and fix the it some other time)

Twitter - @RalisYT
